page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF NEWTON MEARNS
page.content: Newton Mearns is a pleasant residential area on the south side of Glasgow surrounded by farmland. It is on the edge of Fenwick moor and is built on slightly hilly ground which rises to the west. The property in the area is largely of a very good quality and owner-occupied. It is a well-established residential area with pockets of fairly new housing developments, built around two main roads running through the area. There are many trees growing in this suburb which give it a very nice appearance in the summer. The air in this part of the country is very clean and fresh having blown in from the Atlantic. There is a significant minority of Jewish families in the local population who have lived here for many years.
